141  //handle types
142  struct AxFFileHandle;
143  typedef AxFFileHandle* AXF_FILE_HANDLE;
144  struct AxFMaterialHandle;
145  typedef AxFMaterialHandle* AXF_MATERIAL_HANDLE;
146  struct AxFRepresentationHandle;
147  typedef AxFRepresentationHandle* AXF_REPRESENTATION_HANDLE;
148  struct AxFMetadataDocumentHandle;
149  typedef AxFMetadataDocumentHandle* AXF_METADATA_DOCUMENT_HANDLE;
150  struct AxFResourceHandle;
151  typedef AxFResourceHandle* AXF_RESOURCE_HANDLE;
152 
153  //enums
155  enum PropertyType
156  {
157  TYPE_HALF = 0,
158  TYPE_HALF_ARRAY = 1,
159  TYPE_INT = 2,
160  TYPE_INT_ARRAY = 3,
161  TYPE_FLOAT = 4,
162  TYPE_FLOAT_ARRAY = 5,
163  TYPE_STRING = 7,
164  TYPE_UTF_STRING = 8,
165  TYPE_BOOLEAN = 9,
166  TYPE_ERROR = 0xFFFF
167  };
168 
170  enum TextureType
171  {
172  TEXTURE_TYPE_HALF = 0,
173  TEXTURE_TYPE_FLOAT = 4,
174  TEXTURE_TYPE_BYTE = 6
175  };
176 
178 
189  //These two different coordinate systems correspond to the mainly used image coordinate systems: e.g. OpenGL uses an image coordinate system with its origin in the bottom left corner
190  //while DirectX places the origin in the top left corner.
191  enum ETextureOrigin
192  {
193  ORIGIN_TOPLEFT = 0,
194  ORIGIN_BOTTOMLEFT = 1
195  };
196

199  enum ELogLevel
200  {
201  LOGLEVEL_INFO = 0,
202  LOGLEVEL_WARNING = 1,
203  LOGLEVEL_ERROR = 2
204  };
205 
207  enum ELogContext
208  {
209  LOGCONTEXT_AXF_IO = 0,
210  LOGCONTEXT_DECODERS = 1,
211  LOGCONTEXT_GENERIC = 2
212  };
